entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • feat: bulk deploy services & cancel git service build by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/432
  • feat: static directory builder by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/435
  • feat: Nixpacks builder by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/436
  • feat: Railpack builder by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/443

Bug fixes

  • fix: various bug fixes related to nixpacks builder by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/441
  • fix: kill build process on timeout instead of waiting on it by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.8.3...v1.9.0
